## StandardSQLDialect.stringLiteral() method

Returns passed in string in single quotes and escapes all single quotes inside the string with a double single quote.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stringLiteral(val: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  val | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
